title: When the clouds roll by
creator_credit: Sterling Educational Films, Paul Killiam and Saul J. Turell
brief_description: By far the best of the action-filled frolics that made Douglas Fairbanks, popular before his swash-buckling period, this film pokes fun at psychiatry in a manner that is still modern. Full of comedy and thrills and dominated by Fairbanks’ breezy personality, we see the star in some truly astounding acrobatics.
